solution_line_template: There are {initial_waiting_room_people} people in a waiting room, and if {people_arriving} more people arrive, the number increases to {initial_waiting_room_people}+{people_arriving}=<<{initial_waiting_room_people}+{people_arriving}={new_waiting_room_people}>>{new_waiting_room_people}

If three more people arrive, the number of people in the waiting room becomes five times the number of people that are inside the interview room, meaning there are {new_waiting_room_people}/{times_factor}={interview_room_people} people inside the interview room
